summary: Fixes Bound Bow spell tome being replaced by Bound Armor I
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]If you are a fan of conjuration and old school spells from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13166]Mighty Magick[/url]ï»¿, you may be aware or this bug: Bound Bow spell tome was accidentally replaced with Bound Armor I, though the spell itself was modified. This mod fixes the issue (and the spell tome can again be found in Fort Amol).

[/size][size=4]Install after Migthy Magick 4.0.[/size]
author: Alika1
